name: @teamturing/mathking-utils
description: Fundamental business related utility functions for Mathking service
author: Sungchang Park <psch300@gmail.com> (https://github.com/psch300)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist esm && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir dist && rollup --config rollup.config.js
